title: Edit sources.list / point to local cache
body: Allow us to edit our sources.list as we do on other *nix system. This way, we can point to a local package cache, saving time / bandwidth downloading large updates or files.

comments.body: I update sources.list to upgrade from 16.04 to 17.04 (changing to "zesty" in sources.list) no reason that I can think of that you cannot just download the iso expand it and use it for a local repo?
